lipschitz_with_line_map:
theorem lipschitz_with_line_map (p₁ p₂ : P) : lipschitz_with (nndist p₁ p₂) (line_map p₁ p₂ : 𝕜 → P) :=
  lipschitz_with.of_dist_le_mul fun c₁ c₂ => ((dist_line_map_line_map p₁ p₂ c₁ c₂).trans (mul_comm _ _)).le
#align lipschitz_with_line_map lipschitz_with_line_map
is_closed_direction_iff:
/-
Copyright (c) 2020 Joseph Myers. All rights reserved.
Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Joseph Myers, Yury Kudryashov
-/
theorem affine_subspace.is_closed_direction_iff (s : affine_subspace 𝕜 Q) :
    is_closed (s.direction : set W) ↔ is_closed (s : set Q) :=
  by
  rcases s.eq_bot_or_nonempty with (rfl | ⟨x, hx⟩); · simp [is_closed_singleton]
  rw [← (isometry_equiv.vadd_const x).to_homeomorph.symm.is_closed_image,
    affine_subspace.coe_direction_eq_vsub_set_right hx]
  rfl
#align affine_subspace.is_closed_direction_iff affine_subspace.is_closed_direction_iff

theorem eventually_homothety_mem_of_mem_interior (x : Q) {s : set Q} {y : Q} (hy : y ∈ interior s) :

theorem eventually_homothety_image_subset_of_finite_subset_interior (x : Q) {s : set Q} {t : set Q} (ht : t.finite)

    «expr∀ᶠ in , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᶠ in , »"

      «expr∀ᶠ in , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᶠ in , »"

dist_self_homothety:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
@[simp]
theorem dist_self_homothety (p₁ p₂ : P) (c : 𝕜) : dist p₂ (homothety p₁ c p₂) = «expr‖ ‖» (1 - c) * dist p₁ p₂ := by
  rw [dist_comm, dist_homothety_self]
#align dist_self_homothety dist_self_homothety

dist_right_line_map:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/

theorem dist_right_line_map (p₁ p₂ : P) (c : 𝕜) : dist p₂ (line_map p₁ p₂ c) = «expr‖ ‖» (1 - c) * dist p₁ p₂ :=
  (dist_comm _ _).trans (dist_line_map_right _ _ _)
#align dist_right_line_map dist_right_line_map

dist_midpoint_midpoint_le':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
theorem dist_midpoint_midpoint_le' (p₁ p₂ p₃ p₄ : P) :
    dist (midpoint 𝕜 p₁ p₂) (midpoint 𝕜 p₃ p₄) ≤ (dist p₁ p₃ + dist p₂ p₄) / «expr‖ ‖» (2 : 𝕜) :=
  by
  rw [dist_eq_norm_vsub V, dist_eq_norm_vsub V, dist_eq_norm_vsub V, midpoint_vsub_midpoint] <;> try infer_instance
  rw [midpoint_eq_smul_add, norm_smul, invOf_eq_inv, norm_inv, ← div_eq_inv_mul]
  exact div_le_div_of_le_of_nonneg (norm_add_le _ _) (norm_nonneg _)
#align dist_midpoint_midpoint_le' dist_midpoint_midpoint_le'
dist_midpoint_midpoint_le:

theorem dist_midpoint_midpoint_le (p₁ p₂ p₃ p₄ : V) :
    dist (midpoint (exprℝ) p₁ p₂) (midpoint (exprℝ) p₃ p₄) ≤ (dist p₁ p₃ + dist p₂ p₄) / 2 := by
  simpa using dist_midpoint_midpoint_le' p₁ p₂ p₃ p₄
#align dist_midpoint_midpoint_le dist_midpoint_midpoint_le

#align dist_midpoint_left dist_midpoint_left
dist_line_map_right:

  simpa only [line_map_apply_one, dist_eq_norm'] using dist_line_map_line_map p₁ p₂ c 1
#align dist_line_map_right dist_line_map_right
dist_line_map_line_map:
@[simp]
theorem dist_line_map_line_map (p₁ p₂ : P) (c₁ c₂ : 𝕜) :
    dist (line_map p₁ p₂ c₁) (line_map p₁ p₂ c₂) = dist c₁ c₂ * dist p₁ p₂ :=

dist_line_map_left:

dist_left_line_map:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/

  (dist_comm _ _).trans (dist_line_map_left _ _ _)

dist_center_homothety:

antilipschitz_with_line_map:
theorem antilipschitz_with_line_map {p₁ p₂ : Q} (h : p₁ ≠ p₂) :
    antilipschitz_with (nndist p₁ p₂)⁻¹ (line_map p₁ p₂ : 𝕜 → Q) :=
  antilipschitz_with.of_le_mul_dist fun c₁ c₂ => by
    rw [dist_line_map_line_map, nnreal.coe_inv, ← dist_nndist, mul_left_comm, inv_mul_cancel (dist_ne_zero.2 h),
      mul_one]
#align antilipschitz_with_line_map antilipschitz_with_line_map
